meanings.definition: A person who has not been initiated into a particular activity or group.
meanings.sent1: The uninitiate was eager to learn about the secret club.
meanings.sent2: The uninitiate stood nervously at the entrance of the exclusive party.
meanings.sent3: The uninitiate accidentally stumbled upon the hidden meeting room.
meanings.sent4: In the world of wizards, the uninitiate are often unaware of the magical realm around them.
meanings.sent5: The uninitiate's curiosity led them to seek out the mysteries of the ancient order.

meanings.definition: To introduce someone to a particular activity or group.
meanings.sent1: She decided to uninitiate her friend into the art of painting.
meanings.sent2: The mentor carefully uninitiated the new member into the team's traditions.
meanings.sent3: He playfully uninitiated his sister into the world of video games.
meanings.sent4: The guide uninitiated the tourists into the customs of the remote village.
meanings.sent5: The teacher uninitiated the students into the wonders of science through exciting experiments.
